alternate_methods:
You can't report an untaxed vehicle by phone, but you can by post. Write to:

$A

Enforcement Section, W070/D12  
DVLA  
Longview Road  
Swansea  
SA7 0XZ

$A

Include the following:

* vehicle registration number
* make, model and colour
* detailed location
* time the vehicle can be seen on the road if known

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
introduction:
If you see a vehicle on the public road with an out-of-date tax disc, you can report it anonymously to DVLA. Your report will be investigated and action taken, if needed.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
more_information:
^Before reporting a vehicle, [check for free if it's been taxed.](https://www.taxdisc.direct.gov.uk/EvlPortalApp/app/enquiry?execution=e2s1 "check for free if it's been taxed"){:rel="external"}^

Reporting an untaxed vehicle to DVLA doesn’t mean it will be automatically wheelclamped. There are a number of actions that DVLA can take on untaxed vehicles.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
overview: Anonymously report a vehicle on the public road that hasn't got a tax disc
title: Report an untaxed vehicle
